name: ankh
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a symbol like a cross with a loop (= an oval shape or circle) at the top, used in ancient Egypt to mean "life": He wore an ankh on a chain around his neck.
yurii_zym/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
